div.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'; font-size: 48px; color: #333; text-align: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100%;
div.p: Empowering the next generation of public health professionals with AI.
